about_the_game:
This is a collection of bonus content for those who want to further support the developers of Knights of Braveland. It won't radically change your game experience, but it will add new features and possibilities.



A good-natured blacksmith and an enlightened apprentice of a high-land monastery will join the team of the Heroes' Guild. The first is excellent with clubs and hammers, while the second is skilled with a spear.



You get the complete Knights of Braveland soundtrack, which includes 15 tracks from the game in mp3 and wav format. Listen to it anytime to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of knights' adventures wherever you are.

Ten Boss Equipment Items



Defeating bosses allows you to get their weapons or equipment in subsequent runs. Ever dreamed of fighting with Barry the Axe's cleaver or Black Hood's three-shot crossbow? Now you have that opportunity!

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your support - we really appreciate it!
